column1: Today is #SmallBusinessSaturday. Many small businesses are struggling to keep their doors open during COVID-19. This holiday season it is especially important to shop small and support our local community. https://t.co/Tkgs8XjNVR

From our family to yours Roberta & I wish you a safe healthy & happy Thanksgiving. During this time it’s important to remember those brave men & women serving overseas our law enforcement & our healthcare workers on the front lines fighting COVID-19. We‘re thankful for you! https://t.co/cn3Hb2vFT7

Today is #RuralHealthDay. Rural hospitals & healthcare providers are critical to the well-being of West Tennesseans. Thanks to all those in rural healthcare especially as you combat COVID-19. In Washington I‘ll continue to address the unique challenges of rural health services. https://t.co/Xx70bCQeiM
This Saturday November 21 is the deadline to request your COVID-19 economic impact payment. If you have not received this payment and you are eligible click the link below. https://t.co/9jsTZ6V5k8

I signed on to the @WaysandMeansGOP @RepKevinBrady’s bill that will help a greater number of Americans improve their financial well-being and successfully save for retirement. This is especially important now as many Americans' financial security has been threatened by COVID-19. https://t.co/6n9UZKTNUa
This is more encouraging news in our fight against COVID-19!  https://t.co/aVGisLLVqF
Encouraging news! Pfizer trial data shows a new vaccine could be more than 90% effective. This is a step in the right direction in our fight to end COVID-19. https://t.co/a0x5ywEEmT

While Democrats continue to block legislation that would help small businesses @HouseGOP has put out a straightforward plan to restore renew and rebuild our country to where it was before COVID-19.  https://t.co/e2gAIxINtY

There is no doubt COVID-19 has hurt our nation. @HouseGOP @GOPLeader and @realDonaldTrump are committed to restoring rebuilding and renewing our way of life to where it was before COVID-19. Learn more about Republican’s #CommitmentToAmerica below. https://t.co/e2gAIxINtY

This afternoon I spoke at the @EastMemRotary Club meeting. I discussed ongoing negotiations with COVID-19 legislation and was able to take some questions from the crowd. I enjoyed hearing from everyone! https://t.co/pyABolAGTD

I enjoyed meeting with Orgill executives in Collierville this morning to discuss the impact COVID-19 has had on Orgill’s business. I appreciated hearing from everyone. Thank you to Vice Chairman Byrne Whitehead for the invite! https://t.co/wGA3qkw7lZ

Happy #FarmersDay to all of our West Tennessee farmers! Thank you for keeping food on our tables throughout COVID-19. Your hard work is appreciated! @TNFarmBureau  #NationalFarmersDay https://t.co/ZhNydqcVy4

I am working closely with all of @HouseGOP @GOPLeader and @realDonaldTrump to ensure West Tennesseans and Americans across our nation are taken care of as we recover from COVID-19. Through our Commitment to America we will restore rebuild and renew our country. https://t.co/6fc4qFzu09

This week @SpeakerPelosi put forward a COVID-19 stimulus bill that would cost our country $2.2 trillion dollars and it included a number of things that have nothing to do with COVID-19. What we need is targeted relief that will help people and industries across the nation. https://t.co/V1x5H6MUE6

.@HouseGOP @GOPLeader and @realDonaldTrump are working hard to rebuild our economy to where it was before COVID-19 through policies that support businesses workers and end our dependence on China. #CommitmentToAmerica https://t.co/N4fBBxgn23

I encourage W TN farmers to apply for the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program. It will run from Sept 21-Dec 11 2020. Thanks @USDA @SecretarySonny & @realDonaldTrump for this support to our farmers as they continue to face challenges created by COVID-19. https://t.co/xwY8EJJn0v

This week I joined @realDonaldTrump at the @WhiteHouse for the historic peace deal between Israel the United Arab Emirates and Bahrain. As Congress continues to debate a next COVID-19 relief bill I hope @SpeakerPelosi will focus on targeting relief to those who need it most. https://t.co/WV1YhhOjhX

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram has been a true lifeline for businesses in rural communities across our country and West Tennessee during COVID-19. Thank you @realDonaldTrump for delivering this relief. https://t.co/1Tp9zWJL33
Through Operation Warp Speed @realDonaldTrump and @HouseGOP are working hard to deliver a safe and effective COVID-19 vaccine as soon as possible. https://t.co/UsYo7db105

Great news! Thanks to @realDonaldTrump and @HouseGOP the August #JobsReport marks the 4th straight month of unemployment decline since COVID-19. We are on the road to rebuilding our economy! https://t.co/9B31J1TTy8
Great news! The #PPP has supported over 51 million American jobs throughout COVID-19 bringing us closer to the road to recovery. https://t.co/DH04zLhrj5
Stopped by Power Logistics and Freight Service today to discuss business under COVID-19. Thank you to CEO Mitchell Spurlock for a great tour and visit. https://t.co/S7qOLIcolq
I spoke to the @MemphisRotary today to discuss ongoing COVID-19 negotiations in Washington. I enjoyed hearing from and talking with everyone. Thank you for having me! https://t.co/3oeII8YFgX

Stopped by Williams Food Works and Distribution in Obion County this morning to meet with Roger Williams. I appreciate you taking time to give me an update on the state of business during COVID-19. https://t.co/oE08ehBrIn

COVID-19 has put a burden on West Tennessee’s economic and government operations. This funding will help Weakley County respond to the urgent needs of the community while strengthening and developing an economic recovery plan. https://t.co/7odEpHS0MB

Today I spoke to the @ChamberCville and updated them on the current negotiations in Congress on the next COVID-19 relief bill. It was great to hear from everyone. Thank you to Chamber President Mark Heuberger for the invite! https://t.co/1RxKL4gbk4

I spoke at the @BartlettChamber about the next COVID-19 relief bill & how we will get our economy up & running. Thanks to Chamber President John Threadgill for the invite @BARTLETTPOLICE for their great work & West TN law enforcement as a whole for keeping our communities safe. https://t.co/Lc8L9n64Y7
Thank you Mayor Maurice Gaines for sitting down with me this week to update me on Lauderdale County operations throughout COVID-19. I appreciated talking with you. https://t.co/IItpGY0Xl1

Thank you to Lake County Mayor Denny Johnson for meeting with me at Lake County Courthouse today. I appreciated hearing from you about the state of government operations in Lake County during COVID-19. https://t.co/43BIzTye3V

This week I visited with local mayors and sheriffs to learn more about the state of business and government operations throughout COVID-19. Sign up for my weekly newsletter to learn more about my week in West Tennessee. https://t.co/n6pW4Rcnf5

Stopped by the Obion County Commissioners meeting to give an update on current COVID-19 negotiations. I had the pleasure of meeting with Sheriff Karl Jackson and Mayor Benny McGuire while there. Thanks for a great visit! https://t.co/IGUxyXglhT

Thanks to Madison County Mayor Jimmy Harris for a great visit to the Madison County Courthouse this afternoon. I appreciate you keeping me updated on local government operations throughout COVID-19. https://t.co/21XrRuY1so

Stopped by Crockett County Courthouse this morning to visit with Mayor Gary Reasons. Thanks for the update on the state of business during COVID-19 in Crockett County. I look forward to continue working closely with you. https://t.co/pb5fOumWu2

Have you recovered from COVID-19? @realDonaldTrump is working to raise awareness and encourage plasma donations of those fully recovered. To learn more visit here: https://t.co/RAc55vSmBb https://t.co/hCGLgafYRs

Today I stopped by the Henry County Courthouse & the Carroll County Courthouse. I met with Henry County Mayor Brent Greer & Carroll County Circuit Court Clerk Sarah Bradberry to discuss COVID-19 and how it has affected the local government operation. Thank you for a great visit. https://t.co/OT2mDxWaLn

I had a great visit to @MCRSafety to learn more about their PPE operation especially during COVID-19. Thank you to President Mitch Lewellen Company Founder Hilliard Crews & my friend @John_Bobango for the meeting & tour. West TN and our nation are thankful for your hard work. https://t.co/hxkTAhJaJ0

.@GovBillLee has done a great job managing COVID-19 in TN. That is why I joined my colleagues in the Tennessee delegation to call out House Democrats’ who are choosing to only probe states with Republican governors. This pandemic should never be political. https://t.co/41HJrxu9P8
The #PPP has helped West Tennessee businesses get through COVID-19 and safely begin to open their doors. https://t.co/wXsReB3CHo

This week the Senate introduced another piece of COVID-19 relief legislation. Attorney General Barr also testified before the Judiciary Committee. Democrats gave the Attorney General no time to talk making clear they were not interested in what he had to say. Learn more below. https://t.co/lBNJ8dokNg

I sat down w/ @WBBJ7News to discuss the next coronavirus relief package being negotiated in Washington. It's important this bill ensures schools can begin to open our economy can get up & running & businesses can get the financial assistance they need. https://t.co/9kUO5Cfkzh

This week Congress voted to properly fund our troops ensuring they have the resources to complete their missions and defend our nation. Talks also began on another coronavirus relief package. Watch the video below to learn more about my week in Washington. https://t.co/uqxL29OiIy

I sat down with @FOX13Memphis this morning to discuss the next round of COVID-19 stimulus checks. Our nation is hurting and over the next few weeks I look forward to working with my colleagues to help the businesses and individuals who need it most. https://t.co/XPU3XaYYxe

I stopped by Medina City Hall and met with Medina Police Chief Jason Oliver Assistant Chief Joey Hargrove and @JacksonTNPolice Chief Julian Wiser. Law enforcement and safety especially during the COVID-19 pandemic is critical. Thank you for taking time to meet with me. https://t.co/dmToJfgkq3

I appreciated sitting down w/ @NCottonCouncil President Gary Adams to discuss the impacts of COVID-19 & the China trade war on cotton farmers & the cotton merchandising industry. I look forward to continuing our conversations to help bring relief to this great West TN industry. https://t.co/9FJQjiw80G

Enjoyed sitting down with Tim Moran and Mark Miller with @NAIFA to discuss the importance of the #PPP and how it has helped keep West Tennessee businesses financially stable during COVID-19. Thank you both for meeting with me! https://t.co/7ZBaliT8Ik

As a reminder today is #TaxDay. Due to COVID-19 @realDonaldTrump and the @IRSnews extended the due date to July 15. Make sure to file or request an extension for your 2019 tax returns by today. https://t.co/zTlUG2Vhlt

July is National Parks Month! It is important that we recognize the staff and employees that keep our country's community parks and recreational areas preserved and protected throughout COVID-19. https://t.co/iSPdkortZQ

I sent a letter to House Leadership urging the inclusion of my bill HR 6829 that would authorize a US-Israel cooperative grant program to help fight against COVID-19 in the next relief package. It’s vital we continue to work with our ally Israel to combat the current pandemic. https://t.co/Cu2uVO47yS

I joined @RepLizCheney in introducing legislation that will continue telehealth for seniors & those in rural areas outside of COVID-19. Access to this care is important & this bill will ensure it will not go away for those West Tennesseans who need it. https://t.co/JUEL1QdJwM

.@GovBillLee’s Tennessee Business Relief Program will distribute funds to those Tennessee small businesses most affected by COVID-19. To learn more about the program click the link below. https://t.co/UqaOVfZg5Q

Due to COVID-19 West TN rural hospitals have experienced tremendous financial burdens. I’m happy to support this bill that will provide much-needed payroll assistance to our rural hospitals ensuring they are able to continue their critical services. https://t.co/kZo9y2xmA8

This funding is great news! Thank you @realDonaldTrump  and @TheJusticeDept for ensuring West Tennessee can continue to count on the resources needed to fully recover from COVID-19.  https://t.co/KSRs26U3UL

Today's #JobsReport that the U.S. added 2.5M jobs in May is encouraging news. We still have much work to do as our nation begins reopening but it is clear that resources such as the #PPP are helping communities recover from COVID-19.  https://t.co/BTzEGM46S0

Small businesses are the backbone of West Tennessee and throughout COVID-19 they have experienced hardship due to temporary closures. Thanks to @GovBillLee’s Tennessee Business Relief Program Tennessee small businesses will be put on a path to stability. https://t.co/tR1TjENWEo

On June 2 & June 4 my office will resume mobile office hours. If you are having trouble receiving a small business loan finding out where your COVID-19 stimulus check is or  navigating a gov agency our office will help you get the answers you need. https://t.co/htXTm8R4G6

Starting today West Tennessee farmers whose operations have been impacted by the coronavirus can apply for direct financial relief through the @USDA Coronavirus Food Assistance Program. Click the link below to learn more. https://t.co/xwY8EJJn0v

Our @BARTLETTPOLICE & all first responders have been on the frontlines throughout COVID-19 & this funding will help strengthen our emergency response. https://t.co/Rm3OiHqMzb

Our families and our economy need real solutions to recover from the #coronavirus. Instead last week House Democrats brought up a bill filled with far left priorities that had nothing to do with the pandemic. Our country deserves better. https://t.co/8OJ12JwQRp
Tune in to @FOX13Memphis this morning. I will be discussing my time in Washington last week as well as any future funding for COVID-19.
